name: Instagram Analytics
schema:
CREATE TABLE instagram_profiles (
    profile_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    username VARCHAR NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    full_name VARCHAR,
    email VARCHAR,
    phone_number VARCHAR,
    created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE instagram_followers (
    follower_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    profile_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    follower_username VARCHAR NOT NULL,
    followed_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (profile_id) REFERENCES instagram_profiles (profile_id)
);

CREATE TABLE instagram_following (
    following_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    profile_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    following_username VARCHAR NOT NULL,
    followed_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (profile_id) REFERENCES instagram_profiles (profile_id)
);

CREATE TABLE instagram_media (
    media_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    profile_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    media_type VARCHAR NOT NULL,
    media_count INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
    recorded_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (profile_id) REFERENCES instagram_profiles (profile_id)
);

CREATE TABLE instagram_activity (
    activity_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    profile_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    activity_type VARCHAR NOT NULL,
    activity_count INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
    recorded_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (profile_id) REFERENCES instagram_profiles (profile_id)
);

CREATE TABLE instagram_messages (
    message_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    profile_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    message_count INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
    recorded_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (profile_id) REFERENCES instagram_profiles (profile_id)
);
